explains: n. 积累，堆积；堆积物，堆积量
wordGroup: accumulation fund 公积金；积累基金
heat accumulation 蓄热，储热；热积聚
accumulation area 聚集区；积冰区
primitive accumulation of capital 原始资本积累
accumulation of heat 热力储存，蓄热

sentences.en: The funds needed will mainly be drawn from accumulation within the enterprise.
sentences.cn: 所需资金主要取给于企业内部的积累。

sentences.en: And whether the community's work contributes much to an overall accumulation of knowledge is doubtful.
sentences.cn: 社区的工作对知识的全面积累是否有很大的贡献，这一点是值得怀疑的。

sentences.en: Phosphorus-deficient plants are often stunted, with leaves turning a characteristic dark green, often with the accumulation of anthocyanin.
sentences.cn: 缺磷植物常发育不良，叶片呈典型的深绿色，常伴有花青素的积累。
